Text: Finally, KeyCorp increased their target price on Aaron's from $75.00 to $80.00 and gave the stock an overweight rating in a research note on Friday, July 26th. One research analyst has rated the stock with a hold rating and eight have assigned a buy rating to the company's stock. The stock currently has a consensus rating of Buy and an average price target of $69.88.
